text: Wise Girls is a 1929 American pre-Code comedy film directed by E. Mason Hopper and written by Margaret Booth, Elliott Nugent and J. C. Nugent. The film stars Elliott Nugent, Norma Lee, Roland Young, J. C. Nugent and Clara Blandick in her first talkie film. The film was released on September 29, 1929, by Metro- Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Plot== ==Cast== * Elliott Nugent as Kempy * Norma Lee as Kate Bence * Roland Young as Duke Merrill * J. C. Nugent as Dad * Clara Blandick as Ma * Marion Shilling as Ruth Bence * Leora Spellman as Jane Wade * James Donlan as Ben Wade ==References== ==External links== * * * * Category:1929 films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American comedy films Category:1929 comedy films Category:Metro- Goldwyn-Mayer films Category:Films directed by E. Mason Hopper Category:American black-and-white films
title: Wise Girls (film)
